- **Analytics & SEO**: `keywordshub`, `dfs_locations`, ranking tracking
- **UI/UX**: `rackuic`, `coltemps`, `ketch_settings` for interface customization
- **Development Tracking**: `yoshidex_*` tables for session/development logging
- **Geographic Data**: `cities`, `metros`, address/location management

**Notable Features:**
- Extensive use of UUIDs for primary keys
- Rich metadata support with JSONB fields
- Comprehensive timestamp tracking

_**User**_

pleaes suggest a db schema in sql to implement 2 new db tables named

keywordshub_tags
keywordshub_tag_relations


model them after conventions of other tag systems we have in naming, field types, etc. 

---

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Based on your existing tag system conventions, particularly `sitespren_tags` and `sitespren_tags_relations`, here's the SQL schema for the new keyword tag system:

```sql
-- Keywords Tags Table
CREATE TABLE keywordshub_tags (
    tag_id uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    tag_name text NOT NULL,
    tag_order integer DEFAULT 0,
    created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    fk_user_id uuid REFERENCES users(id)
);

-- Keywords Tag Relations Table  
CREATE TABLE keywordshub_tag_relations (
    relation_id uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    fk_keyword_id integer REFERENCES keywordshub(keyword_id),
    fk_tag_id uuid REFERENCES keywordshub_tags(tag_id),
    tag_position integer DEFAULT 0,
    created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    fk_user_id uuid REFERENCES users(id)
);

-- Indexes for performance
CREATE INDEX idx_keywordshub_tags_user_id ON keywordshub_tags(fk_user_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_keywordshub_tags_name ON keywordshub_tags(tag_name);
CREATE INDEX idx_keywordshub_tags_order ON keywordshub_tags(tag_order);

CREATE INDEX idx_keywordshub_tag_relations_keyword_id ON keywordshub_tag_relations(fk_keyword_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_keywordshub_tag_relations_tag_id ON keywordshub_tag_relations(fk_tag_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_keywordshub_tag_relations_user_id ON keywordshub_tag_relations(fk_user_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_keywordshub_tag_relations_position ON keywordshub_tag_relations(tag_position);
```

**Key Design Decisions:**
- Follows exact naming pattern of `sitespren_tags`  `keywordshub_tags`
- Uses same field types and constraints as existing tag system
- `fk_keyword_id` is `integer` to match `keywordshub.keyword_id` 
- All other UUIDs match the existing pattern
- Includes `tag_position` for ordering tags on individual keywords
- User-scoped design for multi-tenancy
- Standard timestamp and indexing patterns

---

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Here's the corrected SQL schema with your modifications cleaned up:

```sql
-- Keywords Tags Table
CREATE TABLE keywordshub_tags (
    tag_id serial PRIMARY KEY,
    tag_name text NOT NULL,
    tag_order integer DEFAULT 0,
    created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    user_id uuid REFERENCES users(id)
);

-- Keywords Tag Relations Table  
CREATE TABLE keywordshub_tag_relations (
    relation_id serial PRIMARY KEY,
    fk_keyword_id integer REFERENCES keywordshub(keyword_id),
    fk_tag_id integer REFERENCES keywordshub_tags(tag_id),
    tag_position integer DEFAULT 0,
    created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    user_id uuid REFERENCES users(id)
);

-- Indexes for performance
CREATE INDEX idx_keywordshub_tags_user_id ON keywordshub_tags(user_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_keywordshub_tags_name ON keywordshub_tags(tag_name);
CREATE INDEX idx_keywordshub_tags_order ON keywordshub_tags(tag_order);

CREATE INDEX idx_keywordshub_tag_relations_keyword_id ON keywordshub_tag_relations(fk_keyword_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_keywordshub_tag_relations_tag_id ON keywordshub_tag_relations(fk_tag_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_keywordshub_tag_relations_user_id ON keywordshub_tag_relations(user_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_keywordshub_tag_relations_position ON keywordshub_tag_relations(tag_position);
```

**Fixes made:**
- Added missing `PRIMARY KEY` to both tables
- Changed `fk_tag_id` from `uuid` to `integer` to match the `serial` type of `keywordshub_tags.tag_id`
- Kept your naming changes (`user_id` instead of `fk_user_id`)
- Kept your type change to `serial` instead of `uuid`
- Updated the corresponding index references

```
1'use client';
     2
     3import { useEffect } from 'react';
     4import { useAuth } from '@/app/context/AuthContext';
     5import { useRouter } from 'next/navigation';
     6import KeywordsHubTable from './components/KeywordsHubTable';
     7
     8export default function KwjarPage() {
     9  const { user } = useAuth();
    10  const router = useRouter();
    11
    12  useEffect(() => {
    13    if (!user) {
    14      router.push('/login');
    15      return;
    16    }
    17  }, [user, router]);
    18
    19  if (!user) {
    20    return (
    21      <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50 flex items-center justify-center">
    22        <div className="text-gray-500">Loading...</div>
    23      </div>
    24    );
    25  }
    26
    27  return (
    28    <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50 flex flex-col">
    29      {/* Header */}
    30      <div className="bg-white border-b px-6 py-4">
    31        <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
    32          <div>
    33            <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-800"> Keywords Hub</h1>
    34          </div>
    35          <div className="text-right">
    36            <div className="text-sm text-gray-500">DataForSEO Integration</div>
```

```
1'use client';
     2
     3import { useState, useEffect, useMemo } from 'react';
     4import { createClientComponentClient } from '@supabase/auth-helpers-nextjs';
     5import { useAuth } from '@/app/context/AuthContext';
     6import dynamic from 'next/dynamic';
     7import Link from 'next/link';
     8
     9const NubraTablefaceKite = dynamic(
    10  () => import('@/app/utils/nubra-tableface-kite').then(mod => ({ default: mod.NubraTablefaceKite })),
    11  { ssr: false }
    12);
    13
    14interface KeywordRecord {
    15  keyword_id: number;
    16  keyword_datum: string;
    17  search_volume: number | null;
    18  cpc: number | null;
    19  location_code: number | null;
    20  location_display_name: string | null;
    21  location_coordinate: string | null;
    22  language_code: string | null;
    23  language_name: string | null;
    24  competition: string | null;
    25  competition_index: number | null;
    26  low_top_of_page_bid: number | null;
    27  high_top_of_page_bid: number | null;
    28  api_fetched_at: string | null;
    29  created_at: string;
    30  updated_at: string;
    31  created_by: string | null;
    32  last_updated_by: string | null;
    33}
    34
    35const columns = [
    36  { key: 'keyword_id', label: 'keyword_id', type: 'number' },
    37  { key: 'keyword_datum', label: 'keyword_datum', type: 'text' },
    38  { key: 'search_volume', label: 'search_volume', type: 'number' },
    39  { key: 'cpc', label: 'cpc', type: 'number' },
    40  { key: 'location_code', label: 'location_code', type: 'number' },
    41  { key: 'location_display_name', label: 'location_display_name', type: 'text' },
    42  { key: 'location_coordinate', label: 'location_coordinate', type: 'text' },
    43  { key: 'language_code', label: 'language_code', type: 'text' },
    44  { key: 'language_name', label: 'language_name', type: 'text' },
    45  { key: 'competition', label: 'competition', type: 'text' },
    46  { key: 'competition_index', label: 'competition_index', type: 'number' },
    47  { key: 'low_top_of_page_bid', label: 'low_top_of_page_bid', type: 'number' },
    48  { key: 'high_top_of_page_bid', label: 'high_top_of_page_bid', type: 'number' },
    49  { key: 'api_fetched_at', label: 'api_fetched_at', type: 'datetime' },
    50  { key: 'created_at', label: 'created_at', type: 'datetime' },
    51  { key: 'updated_at', label: 'updated_at', type: 'datetime' },
    52  { key: 'created_by', label: 'created_by', type: 'text' },
    53  { key: 'last_updated_by', label: 'last_updated_by', type: 'text' }
    54];
    55
    56export default function KeywordsHubTable() {
    57  const { user } = useAuth();
    58  const [data, setData] = useState<KeywordRecord[]>([]);
    59  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
    60  const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null);
    61  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
    62  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
    63  const [itemsPerPage, setItemsPerPage] = useState(100);
    64  const [selectedRows, setSelectedRows] = useState<Set<number>>(new Set());
    65  const [sortField, setSortField] = useState<keyof KeywordRecord>('created_at');
    66  const [sortOrder, setSortOrder] = useState<'asc' | 'desc'>('desc');
    67  
    68  // Modal states
    69  const [isCreateModalOpen, setIsCreateModalOpen] = useState(false);
    70  
    71  // Inline editing states
    72  const [editingCell, setEditingCell] = useState<{ id: number; field: string } | null>(null);
    73  const [editingValue, setEditingValue] = useState<string>('');
    74  
    75  // DataForSEO refresh states
    76  const [refreshingKeywords, setRefreshingKeywords] = useState<Set<number>>(new Set());
    77  const [bulkRefreshing, setBulkRefreshing] = useState(false);
    78  
    79  // Form data for creating
    80  const [formData, setFormData] = useState({
    81    keyword_datum: '',
    82    search_volume: 0,
    83    cpc: 0,
    84    location_code: 0,
    85    location_display_name: '',
    86    location_coordinate: '',
    87    language_code: 'en',
    88    language_name: 'English',
    89    competition: '',
    90    competition_index: 0,
    91    low_top_of_page_bid: 0,
    92    high_top_of_page_bid: 0
    93  });
    94
    95  const supabase = createClientComponentClient();
    96
    97  // Get user ID
    98  const [userInternalId, setUserInternalId] = useState<string | null>(null);
    99
   100  useEffect(() => {
   101    const getUserId = async () => {
   102      if (user?.id) {
   103        const { data: userData } = await supabase
   104          .from('users')
   105          .select('id')
   106          .eq('auth_id', user.id)
   107          .single();
   108        
   109        if (userData) {
   110          setUserInternalId(userData.id);
   111        }
   112      }
   113    };
   114    getUserId();
   115  }, [user, supabase]);
   116
   117  // Fetch data
   118  const fetchData = async () => {
   119    try {
   120      setLoading(true);
   121      const { data: keywords, error } = await supabase
   122        .from('keywordshub')
   123        .select('*')
   124        .order('created_at', { ascending: false });
   125
   126      if (error) throw error;
   127      
   128      setData(keywords || []);
   129    } catch (err) {
   130      console.error('Error fetching keywords:', err);
   131      setError(err instanceof Error ? err.message : 'Failed to fetch data');
   132    } finally {
   133      setLoading(false);
   134    }
   135  };
   136
   137  useEffect(() => {
   138    fetchData();
   139  }, []);
   140
   141  // Filter and sort data
   142  const filteredAndSortedData = useMemo(() => {
   143    let filtered = data.filter(item => {
   144      if (!searchTerm) return true;
   145      return Object.values(item).some(value => 
   146        value?.toString().toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
   147      );
   148    });
   149
   150    // Sort data
   151    filtered.sort((a, b) => {
   152      const aValue = a[sortField];
   153      const bValue = b[sortField];
   154      
   155      if (aValue === null && bValue === null) return 0;
   156      if (aValue === null) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
   157      if (bValue === null) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
   158      
   159      if (aValue < bValue) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
   160      if (aValue > bValue) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
   161      return 0;
   162    });
   163
   164    return filtered;
   165  }, [data, searchTerm, sortField, sortOrder]);
   166
   167  // Pagination
   168  const totalPages = Math.ceil(filteredAndSortedData.length / (itemsPerPage === 0 ? filteredAndSortedData.length : itemsPerPage));
   169  const startIndex = (currentPage - 1) * itemsPerPage;
   170  const paginatedData = itemsPerPage === 0 ? filteredAndSortedData : filteredAndSortedData.slice(startIndex, startIndex + itemsPerPage);
   171
   172  // Handle sort
   173  const handleSort = (field: keyof KeywordRecord) => {
   174    if (sortField === field) {
   175      setSortOrder(sortOrder === 'asc' ? 'desc' : 'asc');
   176    } else {
   177      setSortField(field);
   178      setSortOrder('asc');
   179    }
   180  };
   181
   182  // Handle row selection
   183  const handleRowSelect = (id: number) => {
   184    const newSelected = new Set(selectedRows);
   185    if (newSelected.has(id)) {
   186      newSelected.delete(id);
   187    } else {
   188      newSelected.add(id);
   189    }
   190    setSelectedRows(newSelected);
   191  };
   192
   193  // Handle select all
   194  const handleSelectAll = () => {
   195    if (selectedRows.size === paginatedData.length) {
   196      setSelectedRows(new Set());
   197    } else {
   198      setSelectedRows(new Set(paginatedData.map(item => item.keyword_id)));
   199    }
   200  };
   201
   202  // Inline editing functions
   203  const startEditing = (id: number, field: string, currentValue: any) => {
   204    setEditingCell({ id, field });
   205    setEditingValue(currentValue?.toString() || '');
   206  };
   207
   208  const saveEdit = async () => {
   209    if (!editingCell || !userInternalId) return;
   210    
   211    try {
   212      let value: any = editingValue;
   213      
   214      // Convert value based on field type
   215      const column = columns.find(col => col.key === editingCell.field);
   216      if (column?.type === 'number') {
   217        value = editingValue === '' ? null : Number(editingValue);
   218      }
   219
   220      const { error } = await supabase
   221        .from('keywordshub')
   222        .update({ 
   223          [editingCell.field]: value,
   224          last_updated_by: userInternalId
   225        })
   226        .eq('keyword_id', editingCell.id);
   227
   228      if (error) throw error;
   229
   230      // Update local data
   231      setData(prevData => 
   232        prevData.map(item => 
   233          item.keyword_id === editingCell.id 
   234            ? { ...item, [editingCell.field]: value, updated_at: new Date().toISOString() }
   235            : item
   236        )
   237      );
   238
   239      setEditingCell(null);
   240      setEditingValue('');
   241    } catch (error) {
   242      console.error('Error updating field:', error);
   243      alert('Failed to update field');
   244    }
   245  };
   246
   247  const cancelEdit = () => {
   248    setEditingCell(null);
   249    setEditingValue('');
   250  };
   251
   252  // DataForSEO refresh function (Live endpoint)
   253  const refreshDataForSEO = async (keywordId: number) => {
   254    setRefreshingKeywords(prev => new Set([...prev, keywordId]));
   255    
   256    try {
   257      const response = await fetch('/api/dataforseo-refresh-live', {
   258        method: 'POST',
   259        headers: {
   260          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
   261        },
   262        body: JSON.stringify({ keyword_id: keywordId }),
   263      });
   264
   265      const result = await response.json();
   266
   267      if (!response.ok) {
   268        throw new Error(result.error || 'Failed to refresh data');
   269      }
   270
   271      // Update local data with refreshed values
   272      setData(prevData => 
   273        prevData.map(item => 
   274          item.keyword_id === keywordId 
   275            ? { 
   276                ...item, 
   277                ...result.data,
   278                updated_at: new Date().toISOString() 
   279              }
   280            : item
   281        )
   282      );
   283
   284      console.log(' DataForSEO data refreshed for keyword:', keywordId);
   285    } catch (error) {
   286      console.error(' Failed to refresh DataForSEO data:', error);
   287      alert(`Failed to refresh data: ${error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Unknown error'}`);
   288    } finally {
   289      setRefreshingKeywords(prev => {
   290        const newSet = new Set(prev);
   291        newSet.delete(keywordId);
   292        return newSet;
   293      });
   294    }
   295  };
   296
   297  // Bulk refresh functions (Task-based)
   298  const bulkRefreshVolume = async () => {
   299    setBulkRefreshing(true);
   300    
   301    try {
   302      // Get selected keywords
   303      const selectedKeywordIds = Array.from(selectedRows);
   304      if (selectedKeywordIds.length === 0) {
   305        alert('Please select keywords to refresh');
   306        return;
   307      }
   308
   309      const response = await fetch('/api/dataforseo-refresh-bulk', {
   310        method: 'POST',
   311        headers: {
   312          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
   313        },
   314        body: JSON.stringify({ 
   315          keyword_ids: selectedKeywordIds,
   316          field: 'search_volume'
   317        }),
   318      });
   319
   320      const result = await response.json();
   321
   322      if (!response.ok) {
   323        throw new Error(result.error || 'Failed to start bulk refresh');
   324      }
   325
   326      alert(`Bulk refresh started for ${selectedKeywordIds.length} keywords. Results will be available shortly.`);
   327      
   328      // Refresh the table data after a delay
   329      setTimeout(() => {
   330        fetchData();
   331      }, 5000);
   332
   333    } catch (error) {
   334      console.error(' Failed to start bulk refresh:', error);
   335      alert(`Failed to start bulk refresh: ${error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Unknown error'}`);
   336    } finally {
   337      setBulkRefreshing(false);
   338    }
   339  };
   340
   341  const bulkRefreshCPC = async () => {
   342    setBulkRefreshing(true);
   343    
   344    try {
   345      // Get selected keywords
   346      const selectedKeywordIds = Array.from(selectedRows);
   347      if (selectedKeywordIds.length === 0) {
   348        alert('Please select keywords to refresh');
   349        return;
   350      }
   351
   352      const response = await fetch('/api/dataforseo-refresh-bulk', {
   353        method: 'POST',
   354        headers: {
   355          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
   356        },
   357        body: JSON.stringify({ 
   358          keyword_ids: selectedKeywordIds,
   359          field: 'cpc'
   360        }),
   361      });
   362
   363      const result = await response.json();
   364
   365      if (!response.ok) {
   366        throw new Error(result.error || 'Failed to start bulk refresh');
   367      }
   368
   369      alert(`Bulk refresh started for ${selectedKeywordIds.length} keywords. Results will be available shortly.`);
   370      
   371      // Refresh the table data after a delay
   372      setTimeout(() => {
   373        fetchData();
   374      }, 5000);
   375
   376    } catch (error) {
   377      console.error(' Failed to start bulk refresh:', error);
   378      alert(`Failed to start bulk refresh: ${error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Unknown error'}`);
   379    } finally {
   380      setBulkRefreshing(false);
   381    }
   382  };
   383
   384  // Create new inline record
   385  const createNewInline = async () => {
   386    if (!userInternalId) return;
   387
   388    try {
   389      const newRecord = {
   390        keyword_datum: 'New Keyword',
   391        search_volume: null,
   392        cpc: null,
   393        location_code: null,
   394        location_display_name: null,
   395        location_coordinate: null,
   396        language_code: 'en',
   397        language_name: 'English',
   398        competition: null,
   399        competition_index: null,
   400        low_top_of_page_bid: null,
   401        high_top_of_page_bid: null,
   402        api_fetched_at: null,
   403        created_by: userInternalId,
   404        last_updated_by: userInternalId
   405      };
   406
   407      const { data: inserted, error } = await supabase
   408        .from('keywordshub')
   409        .insert([newRecord])
   410        .select()
   411        .single();
   412
   413      if (error) throw error;
   414
   415      // Add to local data at the beginning
   416      setData(prevData => [inserted, ...prevData]);
   417      
   418      // Start editing the keyword_datum field immediately
   419      setTimeout(() => {
   420        startEditing(inserted.keyword_id, 'keyword_datum', 'New Keyword');
   421      }, 100);
   422
   423    } catch (error) {
   424      console.error('Error creating record:', error);
   425      alert('Failed to create record');
   426    }
   427  };
   428
   429  // Handle popup form creation
   430  const handleCreate = async () => {
   431    if (!userInternalId) return;
   432
   433    try {
   434      const insertData = {
   435        ...formData,
   436        search_volume: formData.search_volume || null,
   437        cpc: formData.cpc || null,
   438        location_code: formData.location_code || null,
   439        competition_index: formData.competition_index || null,
   440        low_top_of_page_bid: formData.low_top_of_page_bid || null,
   441        high_top_of_page_bid: formData.high_top_of_page_bid || null,
   442        created_by: userInternalId,
   443        last_updated_by: userInternalId
   444      };
   445      
   446      const { error } = await supabase
   447        .from('keywordshub')
   448        .insert([insertData]);
   449        
   450      if (error) throw error;
   451      
   452      setIsCreateModalOpen(false);
   453      resetForm();
   454      fetchData();
   455    } catch (err) {
   456      console.error('Error creating record:', err);
   457      alert(`Failed to create record: ${err instanceof Error ? err.message : 'Unknown error'}`);
   458    }
   459  };
   460
   461  // Reset form
   462  const resetForm = () => {
   463    setFormData({
   464      keyword_datum: '',
   465      search_volume: 0,
   466      cpc: 0,
   467      location_code: 0,
   468      location_display_name: '',
   469      location_coordinate: '',
   470      language_code: '',
   471      language_name: '',
   472      competition: '',
   473      competition_index: 0,
   474      low_top_of_page_bid: 0,
   475      high_top_of_page_bid: 0
   476    });
   477  };
   478
   479  // Render cell content
   480  const renderCell = (item: KeywordRecord, column: typeof columns[0]) => {
   481    const value = item[column.key as keyof KeywordRecord];
   482    const isEditing = editingCell?.id === item.keyword_id && editingCell?.field === column.key;
   483    const isReadOnly = column.key === 'keyword_id' || column.key === 'created_at' || column.key === 'updated_at';
   484
   485    if (isEditing && !isReadOnly) {
   486      return (
   487        <div className="flex items-center space-x-2">
   488          <input
   489            type={column.type === 'number' ? 'number' : 'text'}
   490            value={editingValue}
   491            onChange={(e) => setEditingValue(e.target.value)}
   492            onKeyDown={(e) => {
   493              if (e.key === 'Enter') saveEdit();
   494              if (e.key === 'Escape') cancelEdit();
   495            }}
   496            className="w-full px-2 py-1 text-xs border border-blue-500 rounded focus:outline-none focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500"
   497            autoFocus
   498          />
   499          <button
   500            onClick={saveEdit}
   501            className="text-green-600 hover:text-green-800 text-xs"
   502          >
   503            
   504          </button>
   505          <button
   506            onClick={cancelEdit}
   507            className="text-red-600 hover:text-red-800 text-xs"
   508          >
   509            
   510          </button>
   511        </div>
   512      );
   513    }
   514
   515    const cellClass = "px-2 py-1 cursor-pointer hover:bg-blue-50 text-xs";
   516    
   517    if (column.type === 'datetime' && value) {
   518      return (
   519        <div
   520          className={cellClass}
   521          onClick={() => !isReadOnly && startEditing(item.keyword_id, column.key, value)}
   522        >
   523          {new Date(value as string).toLocaleString()}
   524        </div>
   525      );
   526    }
   527
   528    if (column.type === 'number' && value !== null) {
   529      // Special handling for search_volume and cpc columns with refresh buttons
   530      if (column.key === 'search_volume' || column.key === 'cpc') {
   531        const isRefreshing = refreshingKeywords.has(item.keyword_id);
   532        
   533        return (
   534          <div className="flex items-center justify-between space-x-2">
   535            <div
   536              className={cellClass}
   537              onClick={() => !isReadOnly && startEditing(item.keyword_id, column.key, value)}
   538            >
   539              {typeof value === 'number' ? value.toLocaleString() : value}
   540            </div>
   541            <button
   542              onClick={(e) => {
   543                e.stopPropagation();
   544                refreshDataForSEO(item.keyword_id);
   545              }}
   546              disabled={isRefreshing}
   547              className={`flex-shrink-0 w-6 h-6 flex items-center justify-center rounded text-white transition-colors ${
   548                isRefreshing 
   549                  ? 'bg-gray-400 cursor-not-allowed' 
   550                  : 'bg-gray-600 hover:bg-gray-700'
   551              }`}
   552              title="Refresh data from DataForSEO"
   553            >
   554              {isRefreshing ? (
   555                <svg className="animate-spin h-3 w-3" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
   556                  <circle className="opacity-25" cx="12" cy="12" r="10" stroke="currentColor" strokeWidth="4"></circle>
   557                  <path className="opacity-75" fill="currentColor" d="M4 12a8 8 0 018-8V0C5.373 0 0 5.373 0 12h4zm2 5.291A7.962 7.962 0 014 12H0c0 3.042 1.135 5.824 3 7.938l3-2.647z"></path>
   558                </svg>
   559              ) : (
   560                <svg className="h-3 w-3" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
   561                  <path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" strokeWidth={2} d="M4 4v5h.582m15.356 2A8.001 8.001 0 004.582 9m0 0H9m11 11v-5h-.581m0 0a8.003 8.003 0 01-15.357-2m15.357 2H15" />
   562                </svg>
   563              )}
   564            </button>
   565          </div>
   566        );
   567      }
   568      
   569      return (
   570        <div
   571          className={cellClass}
   572          onClick={() => !isReadOnly && startEditing(item.keyword_id, column.key, value)}
   573        >
   574          {typeof value === 'number' ? (column.key === 'location_code' ? value.toString() : value.toLocaleString()) : value}
   575        </div>
   576      );
   577    }
   578
   579    // Special handling for search_volume and cpc columns with refresh buttons (when null/empty)
   580    if (column.key === 'search_volume' || column.key === 'cpc') {
   581      const isRefreshing = refreshingKeywords.has(item.keyword_id);
   582      
   583      return (
   584        <div className="flex items-center justify-between space-x-2">
   585          <div
   586            className={cellClass}
   587            onClick={() => !isReadOnly && startEditing(item.keyword_id, column.key, value)}
   588          >
   589            {value?.toString() || ''}
   590          </div>
   591          <button
   592            onClick={(e) => {
   593              e.stopPropagation();
   594              refreshDataForSEO(item.keyword_id);
   595            }}
   596            disabled={isRefreshing}
   597            className={`flex-shrink-0 w-6 h-6 flex items-center justify-center rounded text-white transition-colors ${
   598              isRefreshing 
   599                ? 'bg-gray-400 cursor-not-allowed' 
   600                : 'bg-gray-600 hover:bg-gray-700'
   601            }`}
   602            title="Refresh data from DataForSEO"
   603          >
   604            {isRefreshing ? (
   605              <svg className="animate-spin h-3 w-3" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
   606                <circle className="opacity-25" cx="12" cy="12" r="10" stroke="currentColor" strokeWidth="4"></circle>
   607                <path className="opacity-75" fill="currentColor" d="M4 12a8 8 0 018-8V0C5.373 0 0 5.373 0 12h4zm2 5.291A7.962 7.962 0 014 12H0c0 3.042 1.135 5.824 3 7.938l3-2.647z"></path>
   608              </svg>
   609            ) : (
   610              <svg className="h-3 w-3" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
   611                <path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" strokeWidth={2} d="M4 4v5h.582m15.356 2A8.001 8.001 0 004.582 9m0 0H9m11 11v-5h-.581m0 0a8.003 8.003 0 01-15.357-2m15.357 2H15" />
   612              </svg>
   613            )}
   614          </button>
   615        </div>
   616      );
   617    }
   618
   619    return (
   620      <div
   621        className={cellClass}
   622        onClick={() => !isReadOnly && startEditing(item.keyword_id, column.key, value)}
   623      >
   624        {value?.toString() || ''}
   625      </div>
   626    );
   627  };
   628
   629  // Pagination Controls Component
   630  const PaginationControls = () => {
   631    if (totalPages <= 1 && itemsPerPage !== 0) return null;
   632    
   633    return (
   634      <div className="flex items-center">
   635        {/* Items per page controls */}
   636        <div className="flex items-center">
   637          {[10, 20, 50, 100, 200, 500].map((size, index) => (
   638            <button
   639              key={size}
   640              onClick={() => {
   641                setItemsPerPage(size);
   642                setCurrentPage(1);
   643              }}
   644              className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border cursor-pointer ${
   645                index === 0 ? 'rounded-l' : ''
   646              } ${
   647                index === 5 ? '' : '-mr-px'
   648              } ${
   649                itemsPerPage === size 
   650                  ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white' 
   651                  : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'
   652              }`}
   653              style={{ fontSize: '14px', paddingTop: '10px', paddingBottom: '10px' }}
   654            >
   655              {size}
   656            </button>
   657          ))}
   658          <button
   659            onClick={() => {
   660              setItemsPerPage(0);
   661              setCurrentPage(1);
   662            }}
   663            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border rounded-r cursor-pointer ${
   664              itemsPerPage === 0 
   665                ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white' 
   666                : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'
   667            }`}
   668            style={{ fontSize: '14px', paddingTop: '10px', paddingBottom: '10px' }}
   669          >
   670            All
   671          </button>
   672        </div>
   673
   674        {/* Page navigation controls */}
   675        {itemsPerPage !== 0 && totalPages > 1 && (
   676          <div className="flex items-center ml-4">
   677            {Array.from({ length: Math.min(10, totalPages) }, (_, i) => {
   678              const pageNum = Math.max(1, Math.min(currentPage - 5 + i, totalPages - 9 + i));
   679              return (
   680                <button
   681                  key={pageNum}
   682                  onClick={() => setCurrentPage(pageNum)}
   683                  className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border cursor-pointer ${
   684                    i === 0 ? 'rounded-l' : ''
   685                  } ${
   686                    i === Math.min(9, totalPages - 1) ? 'rounded-r' : '-mr-px'
   687                  } ${
   688                    currentPage === pageNum 
   689                      ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white' 
   690                      : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'
   691                  }`}
   692                  style={{ fontSize: '14px', paddingTop: '10px', paddingBottom: '10px' }}
   693                >
   694                  {pageNum}
   695                </button>
   696              );
   697            })}
   698          </div>
   699        )}
   700      </div>
   701    );
   702  };
   703
   704  if (loading) {
   705    return (
   706      <div className="flex items-center justify-center h-64">
   707        <div className="text-gray-500">Loading keywords...</div>
   708      </div>
   709    );
   710  }
   711
   712  if (error) {
   713    return (
   714      <div className="flex items-center justify-center h-64">
   715        <div className="text-red-500">Error: {error}</div>
   716      </div>
   717    );
   718  }
   719
   720  return (
   721    <div className="h-full flex flex-col">
   722      {/* Controls */}
   723      <div className="flex-none bg-white border-b px-6 py-4">
   724        <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
   725          <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
   726            <NubraTablefaceKite text="nubra-tableface-kite" />
   727            <PaginationControls />
   728            <div className="relative">
   729              <input
   730                type="text"
   731                placeholder="Search all fields..."
   732                value={searchTerm}
   733                onChange={(e) => {
   734                  setSearchTerm(e.target.value);
   735                  setCurrentPage(1);
   736                }}
   737                className="w-80 px-3 py-2 pr-12 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm"
   738              />
   739              <button
   740                onClick={() => {
   741                  setSearchTerm('');
   742                  setCurrentPage(1);
   743                }}
   744                className="absolute right-2 top-1/2 transform -translate-y-1/2 bg-yellow-400 hover:bg-yellow-500 text-black px-2 py-1 rounded text-xs font-medium"
   745              >
   746                CL
   747              </button>
   748            </div>
   749            
   750            {/* DataForSEO Bulk Refresh Controls */}
   751            <div className="flex items-center space-x-2">
   752              {/* Tooltip label */}
   753              <div className="relative group">
   754                <button className="bg-gray-100 text-gray-600 px-3 py-2 rounded-md text-sm font-medium cursor-help border border-gray-300">
   755                  DFS Task Post/Get
   756                </button>
   757                <div className="absolute bottom-full left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 mb-2 px-3 py-2 bg-black text-white text-xs rounded opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity whitespace-nowrap z-10">
   758                  Task Post/Get: Asynchronous processing
   759                </div>
   760              </div>
   761              
   762              {/* Refresh Volume Button */}
   763              <button
   764                onClick={bulkRefreshVolume}
   765                disabled={bulkRefreshing || selectedRows.size === 0}
   766                className={`px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium rounded-md transition-colors ${
   767                  bulkRefreshing || selectedRows.size === 0
   768                    ? 'bg-gray-300 text-gray-500 cursor-not-allowed'
   769                    : 'bg-blue-600 text-white hover:bg-blue-700'
   770                }`}
   771              >
   772                {bulkRefreshing ? 'Processing...' : 'Refresh Volume'}
   773              </button>
   774              
   775              {/* Refresh CPC Button */}
   776              <button
   777                onClick={bulkRefreshCPC}
   778                disabled={bulkRefreshing || selectedRows.size === 0}
   779                className={`px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium rounded-md transition-colors ${
   780                  bulkRefreshing || selectedRows.size === 0
   781                    ? 'bg-gray-300 text-gray-500 cursor-not-allowed'
   782                    : 'bg-green-600 text-white hover:bg-green-700'
   783                }`}
   784              >
   785                {bulkRefreshing ? 'Processing...' : 'Refresh CPC'}
   786              </button>
   787              
   788              {/* DFS Locations Link Button */}
   789              <Link
   790                href="/dfslocr"
   791                className="px-2 py-1 text-center bg-gray-50 hover:bg-blue-50 border border-gray-200 hover:border-blue-300 rounded transition-colors"
   792              >
   793                <span className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 hover:text-blue-700">/dfslocr</span>
   794              </Link>
   795            </div>
   796          </div>
   797          <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
   798            <div className="flex space-x-2">
   799              <button
   800                onClick={createNewInline}
   801                className="bg-green-600 hover:bg-green-700 text-white font-medium px-3 py-2 rounded-md text-sm transition-colors"
   802              >
   803                Create New (Inline)
   804              </button>
   805              <button
   806                onClick={() => setIsCreateModalOpen(true)}
   807                className="bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-medium px-3 py-2 rounded-md text-sm transition-colors"
   808              >
   809                Create New (Popup)
   810              </button>
   811            </div>
   812          </div>
   813        </div>
   814      </div>
   815
   816      {/* Table */}
   817      <div className="flex-1 bg-white overflow-hidden">

   852                          {sortOrder === 'asc' ? '' : ''}
   853                        </span>

   855                    </div>
   856                  </th>
   857                ))}
   858              </tr>
   859            </thead>
```

```tsx
'use client';

import { useEffect } from 'react';
import { useAuth } from '@/app/context/AuthContext';
import { useRouter } from 'next/navigation';

export default function KwtagzarPage() {
  const { user } = useAuth();
  const router = useRouter();

  useEffect(() => {
    if (!user) {
      router.push('/login');
      return;
    }
  }, [user, router]);

  if (!user) {
    return (
      <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50 flex items-center justify-center">
        <div className="text-gray-500">Loading...</div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50 flex flex-col">
      {/* Header */}
      <div className="bg-white border-b px-6 py-4">
        <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
          <div>
            <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-800"> Keywords Tags Manager</h1>
          </div>
          <div className="text-right">
            <div className="text-sm text-gray-500">Tag Management System</div>
            <div className="text-xs text-gray-400">Project: Keywords Organization</div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Main Content - Blank for now */}
      <div className="flex-1 overflow-hidden">
        <div className="p-6">
          <div className="bg-white rounded-lg border border-gray-200 p-8 text-center">
            <div className="text-gray-400 text-lg mb-4">
              Keywords Tag Management Interface
            </div>
            <div className="text-gray-500 text-sm">
              Main UI will be implemented here as per further instructions
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

```
1'use client';
     2
     3import { useEffect } from 'react';
     4import { useAuth } from '@/app/context/AuthContext';
     5import { useRouter } from 'next/navigation';
     6import MenjariButtonBarFileGunLinks from '@/app/components/MenjariButtonBarFileGunLinks';
     7import FilejarTable from './components/FilejarTable';
     8
     9export default function FilejarPage() {
    10  const { user } = useAuth();
    11  const router = useRouter();
    12
    13  useEffect(() => {
    14    if (!user) {
    15      router.push('/login');
    16      return;
    17    }
    18  }, [user, router]);
    19
    20  // Check if we're in production
    21  if (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production') {
    22    return (
    23      <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50 flex items-center justify-center">
    24        <div className="text-center">
    25          <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-800 mb-4">FileGun Files</h1>
    26          <p className="text-gray-600">This page is only available in development mode</p>
    27        </div>
    28      </div>
    29    );
    30  }
    31
    32  if (!user) {
    33    return (
    34      <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50 flex items-center justify-center">
    35        <div className="text-gray-500">Loading...</div>
    36      </div>
    37    );
    38  }
    39
    40  return (
    41    <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50 flex flex-col">
    42      {/* Menjari Button Bar */}
    43      <div className="px-6 pb-0">
    44        <MenjariButtonBarFileGunLinks />
    45      </div>
    46      
    47      {/* Header */}
    48      <div className="bg-white border-b px-6 py-4">
    49        <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
    50          <div>
    51            <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-800"> FileGun Files</h1>
    52          </div>
    53          <div className="text-right">
    54            <div className="text-sm text-gray-500">Environment: Development Only</div>

    57        </div>
    58      </div>

    60      {/* Main Content - Full Width FilejarTable */}
    61      <div className="flex-1 overflow-hidden">
    62        <FilejarTable />
    63      </div>
    64    </div>
    65  );
    66}
```

Tool use: **Write**

```typescript
import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
import { createClient } from '@/lib/supabase-admin';

export async function GET(request: NextRequest) {
  try {
    const { searchParams } = new URL(request.url);
    const userInternalId = searchParams.get('user_internal_id');

    if (!userInternalId) {
      return NextResponse.json({ error: 'User internal ID is required' }, { status: 400 });
    }

    const supabase = createClient();

    // Fetch keywordshub_tags for the user
    const { data: tags, error } = await supabase
      .from('keywordshub_tags')
      .select('*')
      .eq('user_id', userInternalId)
      .order('created_at', { ascending: false });

    if (error) {
      console.error('Error fetching keywordshub_tags:', error);
      return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Failed to fetch tags' }, { status: 500 });
    }

    return NextResponse.json({ tags });

  } catch (error) {
    console.error('API Error:', error);
    return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Internal server error' }, { status: 500 });
  }
}

export async function POST(request: NextRequest) {
  try {
    const body = await request.json();
    const { user_internal_id, ...tagData } = body;

    if (!user_internal_id) {
      return NextResponse.json({ error: 'User internal ID is required' }, { status: 400 });
    }

    const supabase = createClient();

    // Create new tag
    const { data: newTag, error } = await supabase
      .from('keywordshub_tags')
      .insert([{
        ...tagData,
        user_id: user_internal_id
      }])
      .select()
      .single();

    if (error) {
      console.error('Error creating keywordshub_tag:', error);
      return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Failed to create tag' }, { status: 500 });
    }

    return NextResponse.json({ tag: newTag });

  } catch (error) {
    console.error('API Error:', error);
    return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Internal server error' }, { status: 500 });
  }
}

export async function PUT(request: NextRequest) {
  try {
    const body = await request.json();
    const { tag_id, user_internal_id, ...updateData } = body;

    if (!tag_id || !user_internal_id) {
      return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Tag ID and User internal ID are required' }, { status: 400 });
    }

    const supabase = createClient();

    // Update the tag (ensure it belongs to the user)
    const { data: updatedTag, error } = await supabase
      .from('keywordshub_tags')
      .update(updateData)
      .eq('tag_id', tag_id)
      .eq('user_id', user_internal_id)
      .select()
      .single();

    if (error) {
      console.error('Error updating keywordshub_tag:', error);
      return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Failed to update tag' }, { status: 500 });
    }

    return NextResponse.json({ tag: updatedTag });

  } catch (error) {
    console.error('API Error:', error);
    return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Internal server error' }, { status: 500 });
  }
}

export async function DELETE(request: NextRequest) {
  try {
    const { searchParams } = new URL(request.url);
    const tagId = searchParams.get('tag_id');
    const userInternalId = searchParams.get('user_internal_id');

    if (!tagId || !userInternalId) {
      return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Tag ID and User internal ID are required' }, { status: 400 });
    }

    const supabase = createClient();

    // Delete the tag (ensure it belongs to the user)
    const { error } = await supabase
      .from('keywordshub_tags')
      .delete()
      .eq('tag_id', tagId)
      .eq('user_id', userInternalId);

    if (error) {
      console.error('Error deleting keywordshub_tag:', error);
      return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Failed to delete tag' }, { status: 500 });
    }

    return NextResponse.json({ success: true });

  } catch (error) {
    console.error('API Error:', error);
    return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Internal server error' }, { status: 500 });
  }
}
```

Tool use: **Write**

```tsx
'use client';

import { useState, useEffect, useMemo } from 'react';
import { createClientComponentClient } from '@supabase/auth-helpers-nextjs';
import { useAuth } from '@/app/context/AuthContext';
import dynamic from 'next/dynamic';

const NubraTablefaceKite = dynamic(
  () => import('@/app/utils/nubra-tableface-kite').then(mod => ({ default: mod.NubraTablefaceKite })),
  { ssr: false }
);

interface KeywordTag {
  tag_id: number;
  tag_name: string;
  tag_order: number;
  created_at: string;
  updated_at: string;
  user_id: string;
}

const columns = [
  { key: 'tag_id', label: 'tag_id', type: 'number', width: '80px' },
  { key: 'tag_name', label: 'tag_name', type: 'text', width: '200px' },
  { key: 'tag_order', label: 'tag_order', type: 'number', width: '120px' },
  { key: 'created_at', label: 'created_at', type: 'datetime', width: '180px' },
  { key: 'updated_at', label: 'updated_at', type: 'datetime', width: '180px' },
  { key: 'user_id', label: 'user_id', type: 'text', width: '200px' }
];

export default function KeywordsTagsTable() {
  const { user } = useAuth();
  const [data, setData] = useState<KeywordTag[]>([]);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
  const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [itemsPerPage, setItemsPerPage] = useState(100);
  const [selectedRows, setSelectedRows] = useState<Set<number>>(new Set());
  const [sortField, setSortField] = useState<keyof KeywordTag>('created_at');
  const [sortOrder, setSortOrder] = useState<'asc' | 'desc'>('desc');
  
  // Modal states
  const [isCreateModalOpen, setIsCreateModalOpen] = useState(false);
  
  // Inline editing states
  const [editingCell, setEditingCell] = useState<{ id: number; field: string } | null>(null);
  const [editingValue, setEditingValue] = useState<string>('');
  
  // Form data for creating
  const [formData, setFormData] = useState({
    tag_name: '',
    tag_order: 0
  });

  const supabase = createClientComponentClient();

  // Get user ID
  const [userInternalId, setUserInternalId] = useState<string | null>(null);

  useEffect(() => {
    const getUserId = async () => {
      if (user?.id) {
        const { data: userData } = await supabase
          .from('users')
          .select('id')
          .eq('auth_id', user.id)
          .single();
        
        if (userData) {
          setUserInternalId(userData.id);
        }
      }
    };
    getUserId();
  }, [user, supabase]);

  // Fetch data
  const fetchData = async () => {
    try {
      setLoading(true);
      
      if (!userInternalId) return;

      const response = await fetch(`/api/keywordshub_tags?user_internal_id=${userInternalId}`);
      const result = await response.json();

      if (!response.ok) {
        throw new Error(result.error || 'Failed to fetch data');
      }
      
      setData(result.tags || []);
    } catch (err) {
      console.error('Error fetching tags:', err);
      setError(err instanceof Error ? err.message : 'Failed to fetch data');
    } finally {
      setLoading(false);
    }
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    if (userInternalId) {
      fetchData();
    }
  }, [userInternalId]);

  // Filter and sort data
  const filteredAndSortedData = useMemo(() => {
    let filtered = data.filter(item => {
      if (!searchTerm) return true;
      return Object.values(item).some(value => 
        value?.toString().toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
      );
    });

    // Sort data
    filtered.sort((a, b) => {
      const aValue = a[sortField];
      const bValue = b[sortField];
      
      if (aValue === null && bValue === null) return 0;
      if (aValue === null) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
      if (bValue === null) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
      
      if (aValue < bValue) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
      if (aValue > bValue) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
      return 0;
    });

    return filtered;
  }, [data, searchTerm, sortField, sortOrder]);

  // Pagination
  const totalPages = Math.ceil(filteredAndSortedData.length / (itemsPerPage === 0 ? filteredAndSortedData.length : itemsPerPage));
  const startIndex = (currentPage - 1) * itemsPerPage;
  const paginatedData = itemsPerPage === 0 ? filteredAndSortedData : filteredAndSortedData.slice(startIndex, startIndex + itemsPerPage);

  // Handle sort
  const handleSort = (field: keyof KeywordTag) => {
    if (sortField === field) {
      setSortOrder(sortOrder === 'asc' ? 'desc' : 'asc');
    } else {
      setSortField(field);
      setSortOrder('asc');
    }
  };

  // Handle row selection
  const handleRowSelect = (id: number) => {
    const newSelected = new Set(selectedRows);
    if (newSelected.has(id)) {
      newSelected.delete(id);
    } else {
      newSelected.add(id);
    }
    setSelectedRows(newSelected);
  };

  // Handle select all
  const handleSelectAll = () => {
    if (selectedRows.size === paginatedData.length) {
      setSelectedRows(new Set());
    } else {
      setSelectedRows(new Set(paginatedData.map(item => item.tag_id)));
    }
  };

  // Inline editing functions
  const startEditing = (id: number, field: string, currentValue: any) => {
    setEditingCell({ id, field });
    setEditingValue(currentValue?.toString() || '');
  };

  const saveEdit = async () => {
    if (!editingCell || !userInternalId) return;
    
    try {
      let value: any = editingValue;
      
      // Convert value based on field type
      const column = columns.find(col => col.key === editingCell.field);
      if (column?.type === 'number') {
        value = editingValue === '' ? null : Number(editingValue);
      }

      const response = await fetch('/api/keywordshub_tags', {
        method: 'PUT',
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        },
        body: JSON.stringify({
          tag_id: editingCell.id,
          user_internal_id: userInternalId,
          [editingCell.field]: value
        }),
      });

      const result = await response.json();

      if (!response.ok) {
        throw new Error(result.error || 'Failed to update');
      }

      // Update local data
      setData(prevData => 
        prevData.map(item => 
          item.tag_id === editingCell.id 
            ? { ...item, [editingCell.field]: value, updated_at: new Date().toISOString() }
            : item
        )
      );

      setEditingCell(null);
      setEditingValue('');
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Error updating field:', error);
      alert('Failed to update field');
    }
  };

  const cancelEdit = () => {
    setEditingCell(null);
    setEditingValue('');
  };

  // Create new inline record
  const createNewInline = async () => {
    if (!userInternalId) return;

    try {
      const newRecord = {
        tag_name: 'New Tag',
        tag_order: 0,
        user_internal_id: userInternalId
      };

      const response = await fetch('/api/keywordshub_tags', {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        },
        body: JSON.stringify(newRecord),
      });

      const result = await response.json();

      if (!response.ok) {
        throw new Error(result.error || 'Failed to create');
      }

      // Add to local data at the beginning
      setData(prevData => [result.tag, ...prevData]);
      
      // Start editing the tag_name field immediately
      setTimeout(() => {
        startEditing(result.tag.tag_id, 'tag_name', 'New Tag');
      }, 100);

    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Error creating record:', error);
      alert('Failed to create record');
    }
  };

  // Handle popup form creation
  const handleCreate = async () => {
    if (!userInternalId) return;

    try {
      const response = await fetch('/api/keywordshub_tags', {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        },
        body: JSON.stringify({
          ...formData,
          user_internal_id: userInternalId
        }),
      });
      
      const result = await response.json();

      if (!response.ok) {
        throw new Error(result.error || 'Failed to create');
      }
      
      setIsCreateModalOpen(false);
      resetForm();
      fetchData();
    } catch (err) {
      console.error('Error creating record:', err);
      alert(`Failed to create record: ${err instanceof Error ? err.message : 'Unknown error'}`);
    }
  };

  // Reset form
  const resetForm = () => {
    setFormData({
      tag_name: '',
      tag_order: 0
    });
  };

  // Render cell content
  const renderCell = (item: KeywordTag, column: typeof columns[0]) => {
    const value = item[column.key as keyof KeywordTag];
    const isEditing = editingCell?.id === item.tag_id && editingCell?.field === column.key;
    const isReadOnly = column.key === 'tag_id' || column.key === 'created_at' || column.key === 'updated_at' || column.key === 'user_id';

    if (isEditing && !isReadOnly) {
      return (
        <div className="flex items-center space-x-2">
          <input
            type={column.type === 'number' ? 'number' : 'text'}
            value={editingValue}
            onChange={(e) => setEditingValue(e.target.value)}
            onKeyDown={(e) => {
              if (e.key === 'Enter') saveEdit();
              if (e.key === 'Escape') cancelEdit();
            }}
            className="w-full px-2 py-1 text-xs border border-blue-500 rounded focus:outline-none focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500"
            autoFocus
          />
          <button
            onClick={saveEdit}
            className="text-green-600 hover:text-green-800 text-xs"
          >
            
          </button>
          <button
            onClick={cancelEdit}
            className="text-red-600 hover:text-red-800 text-xs"
          >
            
          </button>
        </div>
      );
    }

    const cellClass = "px-2 py-1 cursor-pointer hover:bg-blue-50 text-xs";
    
    if (column.type === 'datetime' && value) {
      return (
        <div
          className={cellClass}
          onClick={() => !isReadOnly && startEditing(item.tag_id, column.key, value)}
        >
          {new Date(value as string).toLocaleString()}
        </div>
      );
    }

    if (column.type === 'number' && value !== null) {
      return (
        <div
          className={cellClass}
          onClick={() => !isReadOnly && startEditing(item.tag_id, column.key, value)}
        >
          {typeof value === 'number' ? value.toLocaleString() : value}
        </div>
      );
    }

    return (
      <div
        className={cellClass}
        onClick={() => !isReadOnly && startEditing(item.tag_id, column.key, value)}
      >
        {value?.toString() || ''}
      </div>
    );
  };

  // Pagination Controls Component
  const PaginationControls = () => {
    if (totalPages <= 1 && itemsPerPage !== 0) return null;
    
    return (
      <div className="flex items-center">
        {/* Items per page controls */}
        <div className="flex items-center">
          {[10, 20, 50, 100, 200, 500].map((size, index) => (
            <button
              key={size}
              onClick={() => {
                setItemsPerPage(size);
                setCurrentPage(1);
              }}
              className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border cursor-pointer ${
                index === 0 ? 'rounded-l' : ''
              } ${
                index === 5 ? '' : '-mr-px'
              } ${
                itemsPerPage === size 
                  ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white' 
                  : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'
              }`}
              style={{ fontSize: '14px', paddingTop: '10px', paddingBottom: '10px' }}
            >
              {size}
            </button>
          ))}
          <button
            onClick={() => {
              setItemsPerPage(0);
              setCurrentPage(1);
            }}
            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border rounded-r cursor-pointer ${
              itemsPerPage === 0 
                ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white' 
                : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'
            }`}
            style={{ fontSize: '14px', paddingTop: '10px', paddingBottom: '10px' }}
          >
            All
          </button>
        </div>

        {/* Page navigation controls */}
        {itemsPerPage !== 0 && totalPages > 1 && (
          <div className="flex items-center ml-4">
            {Array.from({ length: Math.min(10, totalPages) }, (_, i) => {
              const pageNum = Math.max(1, Math.min(currentPage - 5 + i, totalPages - 9 + i));
              return (
                <button
                  key={pageNum}
                  onClick={() => setCurrentPage(pageNum)}
                  className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border cursor-pointer ${
                    i === 0 ? 'rounded-l' : ''
                  } ${
                    i === Math.min(9, totalPages - 1) ? 'rounded-r' : '-mr-px'
                  } ${
                    currentPage === pageNum 
                      ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white' 
                      : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'
                  }`}
                  style={{ fontSize: '14px', paddingTop: '10px', paddingBottom: '10px' }}
                >
                  {pageNum}
                </button>
              );
            })}
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
    );
  };

  if (loading) {
    return (
      <div className="flex items-center justify-center h-64">
        <div className="text-gray-500">Loading keywords tags...</div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  if (error) {
    return (
      <div className="flex items-center justify-center h-64">
        <div className="text-red-500">Error: {error}</div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div className="h-full flex flex-col">
      {/* Controls */}
      <div className="flex-none bg-white border-b px-6 py-4">
        <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
          <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
            <NubraTablefaceKite text="nubra-tableface-kite" />
            <PaginationControls />
            <div className="relative">
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Search all fields..."
                value={searchTerm}
                onChange={(e) => {
                  setSearchTerm(e.target.value);
                  setCurrentPage(1);
                }}
                className="w-80 px-3 py-2 pr-12 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm"
              />
              <button
                onClick={() => {
                  setSearchTerm('');
                  setCurrentPage(1);
                }}
                className="absolute right-2 top-1/2 transform -translate-y-1/2 bg-yellow-400 hover:bg-yellow-500 text-black px-2 py-1 rounded text-xs font-medium"
              >
                CL
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
            <div className="flex space-x-2">
              <button
                onClick={createNewInline}
                className="bg-green-600 hover:bg-green-700 text-white font-medium px-3 py-2 rounded-md text-sm transition-colors"
              >
                Create New (Inline)
              </button>
              <button
                onClick={() => setIsCreateModalOpen(true)}
                className="bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-medium px-3 py-2 rounded-md text-sm transition-colors"
              >
                Create New (Popup)
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Table */}
      <div className="flex-1 bg-white overflow-hidden">
        <div className="h-full overflow-auto">
          <table className="w-full border-collapse border border-gray-200" style={{ minWidth: '1000px' }}>
            <thead className="bg-gray-50 sticky top-0">
              <tr>
                <th className="px-2 py-3 text-left border border-gray-200" style={{ width: '20px' }}>
                  <div 
                    className="w-full h-full flex items-center justify-center cursor-pointer"
                    style={{ width: '20px', height: '20px' }}
                    onClick={handleSelectAll}
                  >
                    <div
                      className={`w-full h-full border-2 flex items-center justify-center ${
                        selectedRows.size === paginatedData.length && paginatedData.length > 0
                          ? 'bg-blue-500 border-blue-500' 
                          : 'border-gray-300 bg-white'
                      }`}
                      style={{ width: '20px', height: '20px' }}
                    >
                      {selectedRows.size === paginatedData.length && paginatedData.length > 0 && (
                        <span className="text-white text-xs"></span>
                      )}
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </th>
                {columns.map((column) => (
                  <th
                    key={column.key}
                    className="px-2 py-3 text-left border border-gray-200 cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-100"
                    onClick={() => handleSort(column.key as keyof KeywordTag)}
                    style={{ width: column.width }}
                  >
                    <div className="flex items-center space-x-1">
                      <span className="font-bold text-xs lowercase">{column.label}</span>
                      {sortField === column.key && (
                        <span className="text-xs">
                          {sortOrder === 'asc' ? '' : ''}
                        </span>
                      )}
                    </div>
                  </th>
                ))}
              </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody className="bg-white">
              {paginatedData.map((item) => (
                <tr key={item.tag_id} className="hover:bg-gray-50">
                  <td className="px-2 py-2 border border-gray-200">
                    <div 
                      className="w-full h-full flex items-center justify-center cursor-pointer"
                      style={{ width: '20px', height: '20px' }}
                      onClick={() => handleRowSelect(item.tag_id)}
                    >
                      <div
                        className={`w-full h-full border-2 flex items-center justify-center ${
                          selectedRows.has(item.tag_id) 
                            ? 'bg-blue-500 border-blue-500' 
                            : 'border-gray-300 bg-white'
                        }`}
                        style={{ width: '20px', height: '20px' }}
                      >
                        {selectedRows.has(item.tag_id) && (
                          <span className="text-white text-xs"></span>
                        )}
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </td>
                  {columns.map((column) => (
                    <td key={column.key} className="border border-gray-200">
                      {renderCell(item, column)}
                    </td>
                  ))}
                </tr>
              ))}
            </tbody>
          </table>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Bottom Controls */}
      <div className="flex-none bg-white border-t px-6 py-4">
        <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
          <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
            <PaginationControls />
            <div className="relative">
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Search all fields..."
                value={searchTerm}
                onChange={(e) => {
                  setSearchTerm(e.target.value);
                  setCurrentPage(1);
                }}
                className="w-80 px-3 py-2 pr-12 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm"
              />
              <button
                onClick={() => {
                  setSearchTerm('');
                  setCurrentPage(1);
                }}
                className="absolute right-2 top-1/2 transform -translate-y-1/2 bg-yellow-400 hover:bg-yellow-500 text-black px-2 py-1 rounded text-xs font-medium"
              >
                CL
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div></div>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Create Modal */}
      {isCreateModalOpen && (
        <div className="fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 flex items-center justify-center z-50">
          <div className="bg-white p-6 rounded-lg max-w-2xl w-full max-h-[90vh] overflow-y-auto">
            <h3 className="text-lg font-semibold mb-4">Create New Keywords Tag</h3>
            <form onSubmit={(e) => { e.preventDefault(); handleCreate(); }}>
              <div className="grid grid-cols-1 gap-4">
                <div>
                  <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">Tag Name</label>
                  <input
                    type="text"
                    value={formData.tag_name}
                    onChange={(e) => setFormData({...formData, tag_name: e.target.value})}
                    className="w-full border border-gray-300 rounded-md px-3 py-2"
                    placeholder="Enter tag name"
                    required
                  />
                </div>
                <div>
                  <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">Tag Order</label>
                  <input
                    type="number"
                    value={formData.tag_order}
                    onChange={(e) => setFormData({...formData, tag_order: parseInt(e.target.value) || 0})}
                    className="w-full border border-gray-300 rounded-md px-3 py-2"
                    placeholder="0"
                  />
                </div>
              </div>
              
              <div className="flex justify-end space-x-3 mt-6">
                <button
                  type="button"
                  onClick={() => setIsCreateModalOpen(false)}
                  className="px-4 py-2 text-gray-700 bg-gray-200 rounded-md hover:bg-gray-300"
                >
                  Cancel
                </button>
                <button
                  type="submit"
                  className="px-4 py-2 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-md hover:bg-blue-700"
                >
                  Create Tag
                </button>
              </div>
            </form>
          </div>
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}
```

`SUPABASE_URL=https://jerylujyofmmjukwlwvn.supabase.co SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6ImplcnlsdWp5b2ZtbWp1a3dsd3ZuIiwicm9sZSI6InNlcnZpY2Vfcm9sZSIsImlhdCI6MTc1NDQyNTE1MCwiZXhwIjoyMDcwMDAxMTUwfQ.09zsgogOOCZeaJ9R6K5D4q2_jzKXFh54f-CNBfwrEQc node -e "
const { createClient } = require('@supabase/supabase-js');
const supabase = createClient(process.env.SUPABASE_URL, process.env.SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY);

async function createTables() {
  try {
    console.log('Creating keywordshub_tags and keywordshub_tag_relations tables...');
    
    // Create keywordshub_tags table
    const tagsTableSQL = \`
      CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS keywordshub_tags (
          tag_id serial PRIMARY KEY,
          tag_name text NOT NULL,
          tag_order integer DEFAULT 0,
          created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
          updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
          user_id uuid REFERENCES users(id)
      );
    \`;
    
    // Create keywordshub_tag_relations table
    const relationsTableSQL = \`
      CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS keywordshub_tag_relations (
          relation_id serial PRIMARY KEY,
          fk_keyword_id integer REFERENCES keywordshub(keyword_id),
          fk_tag_id integer REFERENCES keywordshub_tags(tag_id),
          tag_position integer DEFAULT 0,
          created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
          updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
          user_id uuid REFERENCES users(id)
      );
    \`;
    
    // Create indexes
    const indexesSQL = \`
      CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_keywordshub_tags_user_id ON keywordshub_tags(user_id);
      CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_keywordshub_tags_name ON keywordshub_tags(tag_name);
      CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_keywordshub_tags_order ON keywordshub_tags(tag_order);
      CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_keywordshub_tag_relations_keyword_id ON keywordshub_tag_relations(fk_keyword_id);
      CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_keywordshub_tag_relations_tag_id ON keywordshub_tag_relations(fk_tag_id);
      CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_keywordshub_tag_relations_user_id ON keywordshub_tag_relations(user_id);
      CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_keywordshub_tag_relations_position ON keywordshub_tag_relations(tag_position);
    \`;
    
    const { error: tagsError } = await supabase.rpc('exec_sql', { query: tagsTableSQL });
    if (tagsError) {
      console.log('Tags table creation error:', tagsError.message);
    } else {
      console.log(' keywordshub_tags table created successfully');
    }
    
    const { error: relationsError } = await supabase.rpc('exec_sql', { query: relationsTableSQL });
    if (relationsError) {
      console.log('Relations table creation error:', relationsError.message);
    } else {
      console.log(' keywordshub_tag_relations table created successfully');
    }
    
    const { error: indexesError } = await supabase.rpc('exec_sql', { query: indexesSQL });
    if (indexesError) {
      console.log('Indexes creation error:', indexesError.message);
    } else {
      console.log(' Indexes created successfully');
    }
    
  } catch (err) {
    console.error('Error:', err.message);
  }
}

createTables();"`
